        (hsub' âŸ¨hac.le, hcbâŸ©)
    Â· rcases mem_iUnionâ‚‚.1 (ordConnectedSection_subset hx').2 with âŸ¨y, hyt, hxyâŸ©
      refine subset_iUnionâ‚‚_of_subset y hyt (OrdConnected.uIcc_subset inferInstance hxy ?_)

      suffices c < y by
